Graphics::Window

Graphics::Window Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

For internal use only.

Represents a rendering window with an associated camera. It is also a wrapper around the Ogre window class.


Public Member Functions

 Window ()
 Constructor. Initializes class attributes.
 ~Window ()
 Destructor. Class release.

 Releases the class resources. After this method is called the class is not valid anymore.

 Updates the class state.
bool isClosed () const
 Returns true if the window is closed. False otherwise.
bool isFullScreen () const
 Returns true if the window is in full screen mode. False otherwise.
void getMetrics (TWindowMetrics &metrics) const
 Used to retrieve the metrics of the window.
size_t getWindowHandle () const
 Returns the window handle.
void attachCameraToWindow (Camera3D &camera)
 Specify the camera that will be rendered in this window. As off this moment, this window will be the render target for this camera.
void setBackgroundColor (const Color &color)
 Modifies the background of the window (really the main viewport in the window).

void Graphics::Window::attachCameraToWindow ( Camera3D &  camera  ) 

Specify the camera that will be rendered in this window. As off this moment, this window will be the render target for this camera.

For internal use only.

Note:
This method modifies the aspect ration of the camera to match the windows' aspect ratio
Parameters:
[in] camera Camera to attach to the window
